infotexts.upgradedescription.turretincreasefirerat: Greatly increase the fire rate and power usage of all turrets at the expense of power usage.
infotexts.entitydescription.coilgunammoboxcopper: Ammunition for the coilgun that higher penetration then lead, but less than piercing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ed_raptorbanespear: A harpoon infused with Rapter Bane for the harpoon gun.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndivingmaskunique: Nothing is out of mother's reach.
infotexts.entitydescription.physicoriumassaultrifl: A magazine designed for holding 6.8mm Physicorium cartridges.
infotexts.entitydescription.handcannonroundhallowp: An exceedingly large .61 hollow point revolver round. Reduced overpenetration and increased knockdown at the expense of overall damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshrapnelshell: A reloadable burst-type munition for the railgun that fires a large number of blunt pellets.
infotexts.entitydescription.railgunshrapnelshellpe: A pellet fired out of a shrapnel shell.
